item.title: Touch, Click, Swipe: Tracing the Journey of Input Devices
item.category: "Computer Hardware History" , "Technology Innovations" , "User Interface Development" , "Digital Interaction Evolution" , "Computer Accessories Trends" , "Tech Milestones" , "Ergonomic Device Design" , "Multimedia Interaction" , "Smart Device Integration" , "Interface Usability Studies"
item.description: Explore the Transition from Typewriters to Touchscreens in Input Devices. Learn about the innovation that changed our digital interactions!

item.title: Network Plus Course: Detection and Prevention Methods for Network Security
item.category: "Network Security" , "Cybersecurity" , "IT Training" , "Network Infrastructure" , "Data Protection" , "Physical Security" , "Security Awareness" , "Access Control" , "Motion Detection" , "Employee Training"
item.description: Enhance network security with effective detection and prevention methods, including camera-based detection, asset tags, employee training, and access control hardware.
